title: BOGO+ Buy X Get Y & Free Gift
description: BOGO+ helps maximize your AOV & checkout rate. We offer multiple BFCM promos strategies like pop-up or auto add-to-cart free gift based on cart value, collection value and quantity purchases. Upsell on cart with discount strategies like buy X get Y (BXGY) for % off, BOGO, Buy more Save more. Reach more customers with translation widget for multilingual store. All BOGO+ campaigns can be combined with Shopify discount codes. The year-end sales season is coming, live support until you succeed!
